title: The Golden Bowl
description: The King is very ill, but a young boy arrives at the palace with a special gift. Everyone who receives it gets 'a warm feeling in their heart, like honey'. What is the special gift? Listen to this beautiful tale told by storyteller Nick Hennessey.
itunes:title: The Golden Bowl
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
